rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MEC3453, TRC3200}
(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MEC4430} and Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MEC4444%})
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-MECH, MAEMECH01} Otherwise true

description: Fundamentals of sound and sound propagation, wave equation, Helmholtz equation, absorption, impedance and intensity, silencers. Transmission from one medium to another, applications and optimisation. Transmission through walls, mass law, coincidence and resonance. Sound transmission in the atmosphere, inverse square law, excess attenuation. Radiation of sound, directivity. Sound in enclosed spaces. Noise sources, noise reduction techniques, noise legislation and regulation, acceptable noise levels, hearing conservation, measurement and analysis of noise, design for low noise.
